greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = a(n-4) + a(n-5), with a(0)=1, a(1)=a(2)=a(3)=0, a(4)=1.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
E. Wilson, The Scales of Mt. Meru
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,1,1)
program: (MAGMA) I:=[1,0,0,0,1]; [n le 5 select I[n] else Self(n-4) +Self(n-5): n in [1..70]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 05 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
ext: More terms from Klaus Strassburger (strass(AT)ddfi.uni-duesseldorf.de), Dec 17 1999
